file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: OCPI OpenAPI definition
  version: v0
  description: >-
    This is a generated connector for [OCPI v2.2](https://evroaming.org/app/uploads/2020/06/OCPI-2.2-d2.pdf) OpenAPI specification.

    The Open Charge Point Interface (OCPI) enables a scalable, automated EV roaming setup between Charge Point Operators 
    and e-Mobility Service Providers. It supports authorization, charge point information exchange (including live status
    updates and transaction events), charge detail record exchange, remote charge point commands and the exchange of 
    smart-charging related information between parties.
  x-ballerina-init-description: >-
    The connector initialization doesn't require setting the API credentials.

    Follow the section [OCPI v2.2 - 4. Transport and format section](https://evroaming.org/app/uploads/2020/06/OCPI-2.2-d2.pdf#transport_and_format_pagination) and obtain tokens according to your Open Charge Point network. Some operations may require setting the token as a parameter.
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: OCPI
    iconPath: "icon.png"
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080
    description: Generated server url for OCN
paths:
  /admin/connection-status/{countryCode}/{partyID}:
    get:
      summary: Gets connection status
      tags:
        - admin-controller
      operationId: getConnectionStatus
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: countryCode
          description: Country code
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: partyID
          description: Party ID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                type: string
  /admin/generate-registration-token:
    post:
      summary: Generates registration tokens
      tags:
        - admin-controller
      operationId: generateRegistrationToken
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: An array of Basic roles
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: array
              description: Array of Roles
              items:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BasicRole"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                type: object
  /health:
    get:
      summary: Gets health of the OCN
      tags:
        - health-controller
      operationId: getHealth
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                type: string
  /ocn/message:
    post:
      summary: Communicates between CPO and eMSP
      tags:
        - message-controller
      operationId: postMessage
      parameters:
        - name: X-Request-ID
          description: Every request shall contain a unique request ID, the response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCN-Signature
          description: OCN Signature
          in: header
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Request body
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: string
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/OcpiResponseObject"
  /ocn/registry/node-info:
    get:
      summary: Gets registry information
      tags:
        - registry-controller
      operationId: getMyNodeInfo
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                type: object
                additionalProperties:
                  type: string
  /ocn/registry/node/{countryCode}/{partyID}:
    get:
      summary: Gets registry details of Providers and Operators by country code and party ID
      tags:
        - registry-controller
      operationId: getNodeOf
      parameters:
        - name: countryCode
          description: Country code
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: partyID
          description: Party ID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                type: object
  /ocpi/2.2:
    get:
      summary: Fetches information about the supported endpoints for this version
      tags:
        - versions-controller
      operationId: getVersionsDetail
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/OcpiResponseVersionDetail"
  /ocpi/versions:
    get:
      summary: Fetches information about the supported versions.
      tags:
        - versions-controller
      operationId: getVersions
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/OcpiResponseListVersion"
  /ocpi/sender/2.2/cdrs:
    get:
      summary: >-
        Fetches charge detail records last updated (which in the current version of OCPI can only be the creation Date/Time) between
        the {date_from} and {date_to} (paginated).
      tags:
        - cdrs-controller
      operationId: getCdrsFromDataOwner
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCN-Signature
          description: OCN Signature
          in: header
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Request-ID
          description: Every request shall contain a unique request ID, the response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Correlation-ID
          description: Every request/response shall contain a unique correlation ID, every response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-to-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is to be sent to
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-to-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is to be sent to
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: date_from
          description: Only return CDRs that have last_updated after or equal to this Date/Time (inclusive)
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: date_to
          description: Only return CDRs that have last_updated up to this Date/Time, but not including (exclusive)
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: The offset of the first object returned. Default is 0
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: limit
          description: Maximum number of objects to GET
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/OcpiResponseCDRList"
  /ocpi/sender/2.2/cdrs/page/{uid}:

        - cdrs-controller
      operationId: getCdrPageFromDataOwner
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCN-Signature
          description: OCN Signature
          in: header
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Request-ID
          description: Every request shall contain a unique request ID, the response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Correlation-ID
          description: Every request/response shall contain a unique correlation ID, every response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-to-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is to be sent to
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-to-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is to be sent to
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: uid
          description: UID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/OcpiResponseCDRList"
  /ocpi/receiver/2.2/cdrs/{cdrID}:
    get:
      summary: Gets CDRs by ID from the receiver
      tags:

      operationId: getClientOwnedCdr
      parameters:

        - name: OCN-Signature

        - name: OCPI-from-country-code

        - name: OCPI-from-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is sent from

        - name: OCPI-to-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is to be sent to
          in: header

            type: string
        - name: OCPI-to-party-id

          in: header
          required: true

            type: string
        - name: cdrID
          description: Charge Detail Record ID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:

      requestBody:

        content:
          application/json:
            schema:

        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:

        - name: OCN-Signature
          description: OCN Signature

          required: false

        - name: X-Request-ID

        - name: X-Correlation-ID

          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header
          required: true

            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-party-id

        - name: OCPI-to-country-code

        - name: OCPI-to-party-id

        - name: uid

        content:

            schema:

        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/OcpiResponseUnit"
  /ocpi/2.2/sender/chargingprofiles/{sessionId}:
    put:
      summary: Sends or Updates a  ChargingProfile by the Sender
      tags:
        - charging-profiles-controller
      operationId: putSenderChargingProfile
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCN-Signature
          description: OCN Signature
          in: header
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Request-ID
          description: Every request shall contain a unique request ID, the response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Correlation-ID
          description: Every request/response shall contain a unique correlation ID, every response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header

        - name: OCPI-from-party-id

        - name: OCPI-to-country-code

            type: string
        - name: sessionId
          description: Session ID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:

        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ActiveChargingProfile"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:

  /ocpi/2.2/receiver/chargingprofiles/{sessionId}:
    get:
      summary: Gets the active ActiveChargingProfile by receiver
      tags:
        - charging-profiles-controller
      operationId: getReceiverChargingProfile
      parameters:

          in: header
          required: true

            type: string
        - name: OCN-Signature

          in: header

        - name: X-Request-ID

        - name: OCPI-from-country-code

        - name: OCPI-from-party-id

        - name: OCPI-to-country-code

            type: string
        - name: OCPI-to-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is to be sent to
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: sessionId
          description: Session ID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: duration
          description: Charging duration
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: response_url
          description: URL that the ActiveChargingProfileResult POST should be send to. This URL might contain an unique ID to be able to distinguish between GETActiveChargingProfile requests
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/OcpiResponseChargingProfileResponse"
    put:
      summary: Creates/updates a ChargingProfile for a specific charging session
      tags:
        - charging-profiles-controller
      operationId: putReceiverChargingProfile
      parameters:

          description: Authorization token
          in: header

            type: string
        - name: OCN-Signature
          description: OCN Signature
          in: header

        - name: X-Request-ID
          description: Every request shall contain a unique request ID, the response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Correlation-ID
          description: Every request/response shall contain a unique correlation ID, every response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:

        - name: OCPI-from-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header

        - name: OCPI-to-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is to be sent to

        - name: OCPI-to-party-id

          in: header

            type: string
        - name: sessionId

          in: path
          required: true
          schema:

      requestBody:
        description: Charging profile details
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/SetChargingProfile"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":
              schema:

      summary: Cancels an existing ChargingProfile for a specific charging session
      tags:
        - charging-profiles-controller
      operationId: deleteReceiverChargingProfile
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCN-Signature
          description: OCN Signature
          in: header
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Request-ID
          description: Every request shall contain a unique request ID, the response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header

          description: Every request/response shall contain a unique correlation ID, every response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header

        - name: OCPI-from-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is sent from

          description: URL that the ClearProfileResult POST should be send to. This URL might contain an unique ID to be able to distinguish between DELETE ChargingProfile requests.

            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            "*/*":

  /ocpi/sender/2.2/commands/{command}/{uid}:
    post:
      summary: Receive the asynchronous response from the Charge Point.
      tags:
        - commands-controller
      operationId: postAsyncResponse
      parameters:
        - name: Authorization
          description: Authorization token
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCN-Signature
          description: OCN Signature
          in: header
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Request-ID
          description: Every request shall contain a unique request ID, the response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Correlation-ID
          description: Every request/response shall contain a unique correlation ID, every response to this request shall contain the same ID
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-from-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is sent from
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-to-country-code
          description: Country code of the connected party this message is to be sent to
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: OCPI-to-party-id
          description: Party ID of the connected party this message is to be sent to
          in: header
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: command
          description: Command of the request
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - CANCEL_RESERVATION
              - RESERVE_NOW
              - START_SESSION
              - STOP_SESSION
              - UNLOCK_CONNECTOR
        - name: uid
          description: Unique id as a URL segment
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: command details
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/CommandResult"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
